We don't have such property, shouldn't we use "MetricParams" or "ReadingParamaters" as this value is part of one of those?

This function is also used to validate updates of "ReadingParametersFutureVersion".
There is small inconsistency, as this property is named "MetricParams" in AddReport and "ReadingParameters" once exposed as dbus property. Shouldn't we do something about that?
This error is not for Id property, but for ThresholdParams (discrete threshold contains user defined name).
